string.description: This string appears on the top of the TimePicker component. It lets the user know that the time unit being changed is hour.
string.name: horologist_time_picker_hour

string.description: This string appears on the top of the TimePicker component. It lets the user know that the time unit being changed is minute.
string.name: horologist_time_picker_minute

string.description: This string appears on the top of the TimePicker component. It lets the user know that the time unit being changed is second.
string.name: horologist_time_picker_second

string.description: This string appears on the TimePickerWith12HourClock component, on top of the minute picker. It lets the user know that this picker is to change the value of the minute time unit.
string.name: horologist_time_picker_min

string.description: This string appears on the DatePicker component, on top of the day picker. It lets the user know that this picker is to change the value of the day date unit.
string.name: horologist_picker_day

string.description: This string appears on the DatePicker component, on top of the month picker. It lets the user know that this picker is to change the value of the month date unit.
string.name: horologist_picker_month

string.description: This string appears on the DatePicker component, on top of the year picker. It lets the user know that this picker is to change the value of the year date unit.
string.name: horologist_picker_year

string.description: Content description of the confirm button of DatePicker and TimePicker components. It lets the user confirm the date or time selected. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: horologist_picker_confirm_button_content_description
